channel.title: Donoter
channel.description: well i've just started letting people dontoe to my server. but how do i add donote sing to the client and donote player rights plz help me plz give me a link for a tut /

item.title: Donoter
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:292900”][quote author=Kuchiki link=topic=387011.msg2899342#msg2899342 date=1249421103]

Server sided…

And…Donator? English would be nice.

Alright, so you cant read and your helpless to him? I understood perfectly.

@co pked - Dont listen to Kuchiki, this is a client and server sided thing. The server only says what the person can do with a certain playerrights. The client is what shows the crown, so that just saying that he was wrong. Also, this can be done, but nobody has made a sucessful non-renamed tutorial for this yet.

ALSO - Please do not post things 2 times. Check to see if it was moved to the correct place first.

Hm. How do you know if he meant crown by “sing”…I was stating he’d get more help in the server help section and if he typed correctly.
[/quote]
Crown is my term for the “crown” that staff gets, he uses sign for that. Its a small typo and an easy understanding for me.[/quote]

Did I say it wasn’t understandable? It’s just quite anoyifg w3n pp1 t4lk l1k3 dis al da teim.

Anywho, there are tuts on adding new crowns for new playerrights. You can just use any playerright for donator, as well. 100…4…12…Doesn’t really matter, as long as your commands do not have…"&& playerRights > 1" because then it will count for donators too.

Read full topic

item.title: Donoter
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Kuchiki, post:4, topic:292900”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=387011.msg2899317#msg2899317 date=1249419696]

Server sided…

And…Donator? English would be nice.

Alright, so you cant read and your helpless to him? I understood perfectly.

@co pked - Dont listen to Kuchiki, this is a client and server sided thing. The server only says what the person can do with a certain playerrights. The client is what shows the crown, so that just saying that he was wrong. Also, this can be done, but nobody has made a sucessful non-renamed tutorial for this yet.

ALSO - Please do not post things 2 times. Check to see if it was moved to the correct place first.
[/quote]

Hm. How do you know if he meant crown by “sing”…I was stating he’d get more help in the server help section and if he typed correctly.[/quote]
Crown is my term for the “crown” that staff gets, he uses sign for that. Its a small typo and an easy understanding for me.

Read full topic
